TopicTitle: What is the best altitude for a Kerbin refuelling station?

Articles.Content: I am planning to build a refuelling in orbit around Kerbin for interplanetary flights and im just not sure what orbit I should put it in.
Erm, isn't this a repeat of your previous thread (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75542)? I think we've debated the subject to death there; just pick your favorite answer.
